text: Oni sprashivayut tvoyego resheniya o zhenshchinakh. Skazhi: "Allakh dayet vam resheniye o nikh i to, chto chitayetsya vam v pisanii, - o sirotakh iz zhenshchin, kotorym vy ne dayete togo, chto predpisano im, zhelaya zhenit'sya na nikh, i o slabykh detyakh, i chtoby vy ustraivali detyam spravedlivost'. Chto by vy ni sdelali khoroshego, - ved' Allakh znayet ob etom
